pkgmetadata.longdescription: Decimated and Undecimated 2D Complex Dual-Tree Wavelet Transform // An implementation of the decimated two-dimensional complex dual-tree wavelet transform as described in Kingsbury (1999) doi:10.1098/rsta.1999.0447 and Selesnick et al. (2005) doi:10.1109/MSP.2005.1550194. Also includes the undecimated version and spectral bias correction described in Nelson et al. (2018) doi:10.1007/s11222-017-9784-0. The code is partly based on the 'dtcwt' Python library.
